dataMapping.title: Inventory Optimization Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Seasonal inventory patterns and availability projections
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary inventory objective (e.g., 'Maintain 95% fill rate across all seasonal periods')

phases.primaryLabel: Seasonal phase (e.g., 'Q1 Low Season', 'Holiday Peak', 'Back-to-School Rush')
phases.description: Seasonal inventory characteristics and market dynamics
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected inventory levels and fill rates
phases.budget: Revenue projection (e.g., '$2.5M projected revenue', '15% above baseline')

milestones.milestoneLabel: Inventory milestone (e.g., 'Peak Demand Forecast', 'Pricing Optimization Complete')
successCriteria: Success criteria (e.g., 'Fill rate > 95%', 'CPM within 10% of target')

dependencies: Prerequisites (e.g., 'Historical data analysis complete', 'Market trend analysis ready')

successMetrics: Success criteria (e.g., 'Maintain 95% fill rate', 'Revenue within 5% of forecast')
